_source.short_desc: Timely salon software runs your whole business from any device. Easily manage your calendar, clients, staff, stock, reporting & more!
_source.long_desc:
Meet Timely: simple software to get your business running beautifully. With an easy-to-use booking system, customisable online forms, personalised messages and all your client info in your pocket, our customers love Timely - and their clients love it just as much.

Join our community of 55,000 beauty professionals and get access to innovative business management software, award-winning customer support, and education from the biggest industry names. 

Start a free 14-day trial at gettimely.com.
_source.pricing_details:
NO CONTRACTS, FREE 14 DAY TRIAL

INNOVATE - Access sophisticated tools, giving you the ability to innovate and grow your business.
$55 AUD per staff member per month, includes 300 SMS credit per staff
#30 GPD per staff member per month, includes 300 SMS credit per staff

ELEVATE - Grow your revenue and elevate your brand with powerful client marketing.
$45 AUD per staff member per month, includes 200 SMS credit per staff
#25 GPD per staff member per month, includes 200 SMS credit per staff

BUILD- Make business easy with the foundations for managing appointments.
$35 AUD per staff member per month, includes 100 SMS credit per staff
#20 GPD per staff member per month, includes 100 SMS credit per staff

BASIC - Take your pen and paper appointment book and make it digital.
$25 AUD per staff member per month
#15 GPD per staff member per month
_source.target_audience: Business management software for busy salons, spas and clinics. Timely is seamless, super-easy to set up and simple to use. Let Timely help run your business so you can do more of what you love.

category_features.name: Attendance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track specific people who attended events or the total number of attendees

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (i.e. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Class Management
category_features.definition: Create and schedule group classes, recurring appointments, and private sessions, etc.

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Marketing Automation
category_features.definition: Plan, track, and evaluate marketing activities including promotions, customer outreach, and branding

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Online Booking
category_features.definition: End users can schedule appointments online

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Self Check-in/Check-out
category_features.definition: Manage check-ins and check-outs of books

category_features.name: Appointment Scheduling
category_features.definition: Book appointments via calendar

category_features.name: Call Reminders
category_features.definition: Reminders sent via phone voice recordings

category_features.name: Confirmation/Reminders
category_features.definition: Track appointments that have been confirmed by customers/clients

category_features.name: Online Booking
category_features.definition: End users can schedule appointments online

category_features.name: Payment Reminders
category_features.definition: Reminders sent for balance/payment due

category_features.name: Recurring Appointments
category_features.definition: Schedule repeating appointments based on a duration of time

category_features.name: Rescheduling
category_features.definition: Manage the rescheduling of appointments

category_features.name: SMS Reminders
category_features.definition: Reminders sent via SMS/text message

category_features.name: Address Book
category_features.definition: Stored list of contacts and groups

category_features.name: Calendar Sync
category_features.definition: Synchronize with other calendars to view mutual availability and schedules

category_features.name: Calendar/Reminder System
category_features.definition: Notifications/alerts for upcoming events or tasks

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: A way to visually represent data where different categories of items are marked with different colors

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Integrate with email such as Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Website Integration
category_features.definition: Seamlessly integrates with 3rd party websites

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders, and payments by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Whip your schedule into shape by letting Acuity do all the heavy lifting. Acuity works 24/7 behind the scenes to smartly fill & manage your schedule. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity's there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly, even as business gets busier?all without breaking a sweat.

related_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one fitness scheduling software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send text & email marketing messages. Build waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Software for fitness professionals to manage and track their client's training and nutrition programs. Start your Free 30-Day Trial.
related_products.features:
My PT Hub is an all-in-one software for fitness professionals to manage their clients by creating customizable training and nutrition programs while tracking their progress and achievements. Get started with our Free 30-Day Trial.

NEW Marketing Features:
- Accelerate your business with Google Ads, all from within your My PT Hub account
- Showcase your business with MySite, your own virtual storefront

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody fitness software streamlines your business management; class scheduling, memberships, payments, virtual classes and more.
related_products.features: Mindbody elevates your customer experience - from the moment they find your fitness studio on our app to their next visit. Step up your studio with online classes, marketing automations, scheduling, auto-renewal memberships, staff and member management, payment processing, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for the fitness industry! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers an extensive online booking system for your fitness business, one that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a full blown website where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, membership, packs and service add-ons on top of accepting payments through the POS system. Sync appointments with popular online calendars, and get detailed statistics about your business. Check out SimplyBook.me to see all our features!

related_products.short_desc: Boost staff efficiency, delight members, and crush revenue goals with Zenoti, the complete software solution for fitness businesses.
related_products.features: Streamline operations, boost staff efficiency, and delight members with Zenoti, the complete fitness software solution. Easy-to-use, innovative features powered by artificial intelligence automate and simplify gym and studio business management, from new member acquisition to billing collections. More than 20,000 wellness businesses worldwide trust Zenoti to help them scale. On average, clients experience double-digit increases in customer retention, staff retention, and revenue growth.

related_products.short_desc: Save time and grow your business with the #1 online platform built for coaches and gym owners. Try TrueCoach free for 14 days.
related_products.features: Save time and grow your business with the #1 online platform built for coaches and gym owners. TrueCoach is trusted by over 20,000 coaches and gym owners worldwide. Starting at just $19 per month. Try TrueCoach completely risk-free for 14 days, no credit card required, cancel any time.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, powerful, appointment booking software for service providers and their clients. Includes online calendar and downloadable app.
related_products.features:
Simple, powerful, appointment booking tool that you and your clients will love! Use the scheduler anywhere: the app or any browser. Customers can book with ease using the Visibook app or online calendar.
Easy booking and customer tracking.
Reduce no-shows.
Individual and class scheduler.
Payments tool.
Client messaging and notes.
Simple, free set up.
Control your schedule.
Work around your personal calendar.
Less email and hassle.
Manage staff.
Multi-Platform tool.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you could ever want or need to become a successful online personal trainer and fitness coach, all in one place.
related_products.features:
Start your Fitness Coach journey with a 1 Month Free Trial.  Reach more people, save time and deliver incredible results. Your ultimate online fitness business starts with PT Distinction. Beautiful software to run your entire training business.
Packed with powerful features and stunningly simple to use, we've crafted PTD to make running your fitness training empire a pure joy. We are trusted by thousands of  Trainers just like you! Check out our latest award: Top Performer on Capterra.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for Fitness Studios.
related_products.features:
WellnessLiving, an all-in-one business management software, has all the tools you need to attract, convert, & retain more clients. 

We offer the fitness & wellness industry an affordable, easy-to-use, fully customizable platform that streamlines business management. Dynamic tools include online booking solutions, POS, payroll, reputation management, email/SMS marketing suite, rewards program, robust reporting, and so much more! It's the only software you need to run and grow your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for Fitness Studios.
similar_products.features:
WellnessLiving, an all-in-one business management software, has all the tools you need to attract, convert, & retain more clients.

similar_products.short_desc: Our fitness studio management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue.
similar_products.features: Our fitness studio management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue. From scheduling to payments processing, the Glofox software has clever automations to keep you in control of your fitness business. With a branded mobile app & website portal, members can book and pay for services online or from the palm of their hand at a time of their convenience.

similar_products.short_desc: Mindbody fitness software streamlines your business management; class scheduling, memberships, payments, virtual classes and more.
similar_products.features: Mindbody elevates your customer experience - from the moment they find your fitness studio on our app to their next visit. Step up your studio with online classes, marketing automations, scheduling, auto-renewal memberships, staff and member management, payment processing, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders, and payments by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
similar_products.features: Whip your schedule into shape by letting Acuity do all the heavy lifting. Acuity works 24/7 behind the scenes to smartly fill & manage your schedule. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity's there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly, even as business gets busier?all without breaking a sweat.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, the fitness software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments & admin, while you focus on your clients.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one fitness software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on what matters most to you. Let clients easily book sessions 24/7 online or with a handy mobile app-and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations & reminders. Supercharge your fitness business with a powerful calendar, time-saving automations and features built with your clients in mind. Be the best kind of busy with Dayful.

similar_products.short_desc: Walla is a modern boutique studio software built to save time, capture revenue, and retain more clients.
similar_products.features:
Walla is a powerful, all-in-one studio management software created for (and with) the studio owner in mind. Built by a team of fitness industry experts who have been behind the front desk and behind the scenes of global wellness tech platforms, our goal is to simplify everyday business operations through intuitive time-saving touchpoints. 

With a sleek, modern design, Walla's user-centric platform has the exact features studios and staff need to run their fitness business more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Ensure a free flow of clients in and out of facilities by defining access parameters at each point of entry. Eliminate bottlenecks!
similar_products.features: Optimize how you use your facilities! Juggling multiple software and worrying about compatibility is a thing of the past. Do everything from managing schedules & conflicts, offering rentals, managing staff permissions, client access, and more - under one roof. Save both time and money. Our facility calendar makes managing facility schedules easier than ever. Manage all facilities through a single interface while keeping rentals, reservations, and maintenance blocks in mind.

similar_products.short_desc: Paramount's Pulse Software helps you manage everything in your gym. From your front desk to your back office, we can help!
similar_products.features: Paramount is a full-service software, billing, and customer service call center designed to help you manage your entire gym business. Paramount's Pulse System is the club management software of your dreams. From your front desk to your back office we have everything you need. Some of the software features include dashboard reporting, employee and facility scheduler, point of sale, member portal, personal training software, facility management, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Comprehensive easy-to-use fitness center management software.
similar_products.features:
Run your gym with Insight! 

Built from the ground up by gym owners, Gym Insight is a comprehensive software system designed to make your fitness business more profitable. Memberships, personal training, class scheduling, SMS, access management, and even point of sale are made simple and easy, saving time for members, employees, trainers, and managers.  

Customizable dashboards and comprehensive reports let you track a multitude of stats including account payment status, monthly dues, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: TeamUp is an easier to use and better value management Software that takes away the complexity of running a fitness gym, box, or studio
similar_products.features: TeamUp is software for ambitious fitness business owners that does things differently. Take away the complexity of running your gym, box, or studio with easier to use and better value management software. Keep your classes full and bring all the best parts of your business together all-in-one tool. Easily manage all your gym/studio customers' data, streamline your admin and marketing activities, optimise your sales processes and stand out from competitors with the best client experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Virtuagym is a unique, all-in-one fitness solution tailor made for personal trainers and fitness businesses of all sizes.
similar_products.features:
Virtuagym offers an all-in-one software solution for personal trainers and fitness businesses of all sizes combining nutrition, workout planning, billing, client management and more in one user-friendly bundle.

Built from the ground-up for fitness fanatics who want to get the most out of each working hour, Virtuagym is the perfect companion to breathe fresh life into your business.

Ready to take your fitness business to the next level? Book your free demo!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one gym software with everything you need to run your gym effectively. We Build Fitness Communities.
similar_products.features:
Get ready to streamline your fitness business with a connected system. Triib's all-in-one gym management platform empowers you with a connected desktop platform, self-service kiosk & point-of-sale, and both android and iOS mobile apps, all at one flat rate.

We've built everything under the hood to optimize your day-to-day, saving you time & effort. Get all the tools you need with the best customer success team in the industry. Ensure your success with Triib.

similar_products.short_desc: Sign up in less than 1 minute and start growing your dance studio with modern fitness software.
similar_products.features: Modern gym management software - nobody likes wasting time on things that could be done online. Your customers will love the fact that they can sign up for a class, confirm their attendance and pay fully online, increasing your retention and allowing you to focus on your business.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Personal Trainer software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Personal Trainer tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Personal Trainer software assists fitness professionals to schedule and track workout sessions for their clients, as well as collecting payments, and automating communication.

_source.short_desc: Timely salon software runs your whole business from any device. Easily manage your calendar, clients, staff, stock, reporting & more!
_source.long_desc:
We're here to grow the value of the beauty industry, with you and for you. Join the Timely community of 46,000 supportive & connected beauty professionals and get access to innovative business management software, award-winning customer support, education from the biggest industry names all over the world, and support from your peers.
Timely is designed to suit your business at any size, stage and budget. We love helping you succeed, so join us today! Start a free 14-day trial at gettimely.com.
_source.pricing_details:
NO CONTRACTS, FREE 14 DAY TRIAL

INNOVATE - Access sophisticated tools, giving you the ability to innovate and grow your business.
$55 AUD per staff member per month, includes 300 SMS credit per staff
#30 GPD per staff member per month, includes 300 SMS credit per staff

ELEVATE - Grow your revenue and elevate your brand with powerful client marketing.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Salon Management Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Reach more clients with the simple, customizable scheduling solution that looks and feels as good as a day at the salon.
related_products.features: With Acuity Scheduling, booking clients looks and feels as good as the services you provide for them. Customize individual calendars for your staff and locations, and set up appointment types that keep clients coming back for more, including gift certificates and multi-service bookings. Empower clients to book and pay directly from your website or social profile. Acuity will be there to automate branded emails and texts to keep your clients in the loop, on time, and in control of rescheduling.

related_products.short_desc: Use Vagaro Salon Software & Apps to get booked, process payments, send reminders and market your business. Starting Price: $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one salon management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Reach more customers Text & Email Marketing. Get booked on the Vagaro Marketplace and on social media. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage appointments and packages while on the go. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody elevates your customer experience - from the moment they find your salon on our app to their next visit. Step up your salon with marketing automations, scheduling, staff management, payment processing, automated reminders, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Fresha is the world's leading software for salons and spas and is totally subscription-free!
related_products.features: Fresha is the world's leading booking software for salons and is totally subscription-free! Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your salon. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing for deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform For SMB's! Create a Free Account
related_products.features: Get everything you need to manage and grow your business,  all from a singular platform  create your free account today to explore the platform and compare plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for Salons! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.

You get a full blown website, or a booking widget if you already have a website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your Salon with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based online booking, scheduling, point of sale and marketing software - everything you need to make your life easier.
related_products.features: Booker's cutting-edge salon software helps your run and grow your salon with an all-in-one platform that understands you'd rather be focusing on your clients instead of your administrative duties. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Spa software automates and manages health/medical spa operations. Medical Spa (also called Med Spa or Medi Spa) solutions typically feature easy integration with cash registers, bar code readers and other point of sale hardware. Medical Spas provide treatments including skin tightening, laser hair removal, peels, liposuction, cosmetic dental work and more. Medical Spas typically use these applications to add efficiency and value to a wide variety of business processes including: appointment scheduling, online calendar, client management and marketing, employee data, commission calculation, inventory control, payroll, point of sale and others. For related products see Salon software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spa software automates all aspects of business management for various types of spas, including day spas. Software functionality typically includes inventory management, appointment scheduling, gift card processing, point of sale, and other retail customer service oriented capabilities. Spa software is related to Medical Spa software and Salon Software
